                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Proficiency in written and spoken English at a C1 level of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CECR) duly confirmed by language certificates specified in the Call for ESWOCHY (see information below).
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; text-align: center;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 18.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          2. REQUIRED DOCUMENTATION
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Required documentation must be uploaded as digital copies and in English language versions. The required documents are:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         1.
                         <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         ESWOCHY Curriculum Vitae (other CV forms are not considered)
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         2.
                         <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         A scan of passport (only of EU citizens a scan of the national ID will be accepted conditionally if the applicant does not have a passport at the time of application);
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         3.
                         <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         A proof of residence (residence certificate or a certificate from the applicant’s workplace, study institution or training institution, billing invoice; (certified translation to English);
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         4.
                         <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         A scan of an official
                         <b>
                          Bachelor degree
                         </b>
                         diploma (
                         <b>
                          Master degree diploma
                         </b>
                        </span>
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: red; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          is not considered and will be ignored
                         </span>
                        </b>
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         ) or other equivalent University level higher education degree diploma along with official supplement listing courses taken and the respective grades (official academic transcripts of each study year) (certified translation to English) *.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <i>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                          5.
                          <span style="font-style: normal; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                          </span>
                         </span>
                        </i>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Certificates of English language proficiency,
                        </span>
                        <em>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif; color: #444444; letter-spacing: 0.5pt; border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0cm; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                          Cambridge Advanced (CAE), BEC Higher, BULATS score 75-89, CLB/CELPIP 8-9, CAEL 70, IELTS level 7, TOEFL 110-120, TOEIC score 88 or proof of equivalent experience (e.g. previous degree taught in English).
                         </span>
                        </em>
                        <i>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; color: #365078; background: #EFF7F9; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                         </span>
                        </i>
                        <i>
                        </i>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         6.
                         <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Evidence of work experience  for last 5 years in the field of social work, voluntary social work with children and youth etc. (if any).
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; mso-layout-grid-align: none; text-autospace: none;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                         Filling in ESWOCHY CV form please provide only relevant, essential, clear, well-structured information.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; mso-layout-grid-align: none; text-autospace: none;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                         The documents supporting the application must be submitted in English. Failure to present the documents required under the terms of this announcement, or presenting them after the deadline or presenting a false document or document with false information will result in the exclusion of the candidature.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ul>
                        <li class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -18.0pt; mso-list: l7 level1 lfo9;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                          <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                           <span style="font-family: Symbol;">
                           </span>
                          </span>
                         </span>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                          If the original educational documents/transcripts are in English, Lithuanian with an apostille (
                         </span>
                         <a href="https://keliauk.urm.lt/lt/gyvenantiems-uzsienyje/konsulines-funkcijos-lietuvos-pilieciams/dokumentu-legalizavimas-ir-tvirtinimas-pazyma-apostille/sarasas-valstybiu-prisijungusiu-prie-1961-m-hagos-konvencijos-del-uzsienio-valstybese-isduotu-dokumentu-legalizavimo-panaikinimo" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                          <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                           if required
                          </span>
                         </a>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                          ) on the scanned original, no translation needed.
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -18.0pt; mso-list: l7 level1 lfo9;">
                         <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                         </span>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                          If original educational documents/transcripts are not in English, Lithuanian languages, then they have to be supplemented with an official translation.
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -18.0pt; mso-list: l7 level1 lfo9;">
                         <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                         </span>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-ansi-language: EN-US;">
                          The official translation has to be confirmed with the sworn translator’s signature or official notarization.
                         </span>
                         <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Documents uploaded must be in good
                         </span>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16.0pt; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          condition and in full color.
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: red; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                         BEFORE YOU APPLY MAKE SURE THAT YOU HAVE A COMPLETE DOCUMENTATION PACKAGE AND THAT YOUR QUALIFICATIONS ARE GIVING ACCESS TO HIGHER EDUCATION.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Privacy policy
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Personal data is processed in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/PDF/?uri=CELEX:32016R0679&from=EN
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Applicants’ personal information will be collected and used in accordance with the Regulation (EC) N° 45/2001 of the European Parliament and of the Council from December 18, 2000, on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data by the Community institutions and bodies and on the free movement of such data (OJ L8 of 12.1.2001, p.1).
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Each partner ensures that students’ personal data is processed and collected in accordance with the Regulation and the purposes of this agreement. Since students will study at all four Partner Universities in order to exercise the Data Subject’s rights, the student must apply to the relevant University where he / she wishes to exercise the Data Subject’s rights.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          SELECTION
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 6pt; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Selection and admission procedures
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         The selection and admission process will consist of three phases:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ul type="disc">
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          eligibility check,
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          preselection,
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          interview.
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Evaluation points
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Each eligible application will be evaluated on a 20-point scale by the Joint Admission Committee.
                        </span>
                        <b>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="MsoTableGrid" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: none; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-yfti-tbllook: 1184; mso-padding-alt: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;">
                        <tbody>

                           <td style="width: 134.45pt; border: solid windowtext 1.0pt; border-top: none; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;" valign="top" width="179">
                            <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;">
                             <span lang="EN-GB" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                              15
                             </span>
                            </p>
                           </td>
                          </tr>
                         </tbody>
                        </table>
                       </div>
                       <ul>
                        <li class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol; color: red; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                         </span>
                         <b>
                          <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                           Academic recognition of educational documents
                          </span>
                         </b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                          .
                         </span>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: red; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          PLEASE NOTE THAT THE PROCESS OF EDUCATIONAL DOCUMENTS RECOGNITION MAY TAKE QUITE LONG – UP TO 5 months, SO DO NOT KEEP THE DOCUMENTS SUBMISSION UNTIL THE DEADLINE.
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle" style="margin-left: 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Courier New';">
                         o
                         <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                          The academic recognition should take up to 15 days
                         </span>
                        </b>
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         if the documents are issued by the following countries: Ireland, Albania, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Bangladesh, Denmark, Egypt, Estonia, Ghana, Georgia (Sakartvelo), Germany. India, Iran, Italy, Latvia, Spain, Israel, Japan, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, United States of America, Cameroon, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Lebanon, Moldova, Nepal, Nigeria, the Netherlands, Norway, Pakistan, South Korea, France, Russia, Finland, Sweden, Turkey, Ukraine, Uzbekistan,
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpLast" style="margin-left: 72pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -18pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <!-- [if !supportLists]-->
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Courier New';">
                         o
                         <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                        <!--[endif]-->
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                          The academic recognition may take up more than one month
                         </span>
                        </b>
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         if educational documents were issued by countries that are not indicated in the list above as its evaluation is proceeded by the Centre for Quality Assessment in Higher Education (SKVC). In case the educational documents cannot be evaluated until the deadline for scholarship application, applicants are invited to participate in the competition as self-funded students or wait for the next intake which is scheduled to commence in October 2023.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Candidates whose applications fail to meet any of the above-mentioned requirements (Point 1) will be considered ineligible and excluded.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         The Coordinating Institution will notify ineligible participants about the reasons for their exclusion and the appeal procedure not later than one week after the closure of the call.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Step 2. Preselection
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         The applications of the candidates with appropriate Bachelor’s degree results will be selected for Step 2 to evaluate education background and experience in accordance with the following criteria:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="MsoTableGrid" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: none; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-yfti-tbllook: 1184; mso-padding-alt: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;">
                        <tbody>

                            <span lang="EN-GB" style="font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-ansi-language: EN-GB;">
                             Criteria
                            </span>
                           </p>
                          </td>
                          <td style="width: 240.7pt; border: solid windowtext 1.0pt; border-left: none; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;" valign="top" width="321">

                          <td style="width: 240.7pt; border-top: none; border-left: none; border-bottom: solid windowtext 1.0pt; border-right: solid windowtext 1.0pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;" valign="top" width="321">
                           <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;">

                           <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;">

                             not considered

                           <p align="center" class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; text-align: center; line-height: normal;">

                             Experience (CV)

                           <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;">

                         <tr>
                          <td style="width: 240.7pt; border: solid windowtext 1.0pt; border-top: none; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;" valign="top" width="321">

                             Scientific research activities (scientific publications, presentation in scientific conferences, participation in research projects et.) proved by documents
                            </span>
                           </p>

                           <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;">
                            <span lang="EN-GB" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                             1
                            </span>
                           </p>
                          </td>
                         </tr>
                         <tr>
                          <td style="width: 240.7pt; border: solid windowtext 1.0pt; border-top: none; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;" valign="top" width="321">
                           <p align="right" class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; text-align: right; line-height: normal;">
                            <span lang="EN-GB" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                             Total
                            </span>
                           </p>
                          </td>
                          <td style="width: 240.7pt; border-top: none; border-left: none; border-bottom: solid windowtext 1.0pt; border-right: solid windowtext 1.0pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;" valign="top" width="321">
                           <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: .0001pt; line-height: normal;">
                            <span lang="EN-GB" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">

                       </table>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Joint Admission Committee shall review the final grading and comments, compile a ranking based on average scores. Best candidates will be invited by email to the 3rd step (interview). The remaining candidates will be notified by email about the panel’s decision and alerted to the appeal procedure. All candidates will be informed by email of preselection outcome around two months after the closure of the Call for Applications.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Step 3. Interviews
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         All the candidates who have successfully passed the preselection will be informed by email of the date and time of their interview. Interviews will be conducted via video conferencing by Joint Admission committee
                         <b>
                          . Each interview will be recorded.
                         </b>
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         During the interview, candidates will be assessed against sets of criteria:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ul type="disc">
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          ability to understand questions and provide adequate and concise answers;
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          ability to demonstrate the adequacy and consistency between the objectives of the Programme and the applicants’ background;
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          knowledge of social research methods and statistics;
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          motivation
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Each candidate participating in the interview must provide his/her ID. Candidates who are not on the list of scheduled interview time cannot participate in the interview. Candidates must have a good internet connection and equipment to ensure the proper quality of the interviews as well as video camera on. There must be nobody in the room with the candidate during interview. An interview interrupted due to technical obstacles shall not be recorded as having taken place, unless the Joint Admissions Committee no longer has a question as to the suitability of the candidate.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         The performance of a candidate in the interview is evaluated in 10-point system.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Selection decision
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Once the interview phase is completed, the Admission Committee will agree on the final, absolute ranking of candidates. The absolute ranking shall specify the candidates who:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ul type="disc">
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Have been admitted and awarded an EMJM scholarship (separate lists for Programme and Partner Country applicants);
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Have been included on a reserve list for an EMJM scholarship (separate lists for Programme and Partner Country applicants);
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Have been admitted as self-financed students;
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Have not been admitted.
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         All candidates admitted to the interview phase will be informed by email of the final results. Information about the place in the ranking is not provided.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Additionally, admitted candidates will be informed of the enrolment procedure, and provided with all relevant documents including the Student Agreement. Candidates who have been awarded the EMJM grant shall receive the Notice of Award, a document notifying the grantee an award has been made, containing or referencing all terms and conditions of the award, as well as the Scholarship Contract.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: 15.6pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 15.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Self-funded students
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Applicants that
                         <b>
                          meet academic requirements
                         </b>
                         but are not awarded an EMJM scholarship grant may be admitted in the Programme as self-funded students on the condition that:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ul type="disc">
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          They comply with visa requirements in the countries they intend to go (Lithuania, Latvia, Slovakia and Portugal);
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          Pay the tuition fee for the first year before the enrolment. More information
                         </span>
                         <span style="color: windowtext;">
                          <a href="https://eswochy.eu/fees-scholarships/">
                           <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: blue; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                            here
                           </span>
                          </a>
                         </span>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          .
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 18pt 0cm 6pt; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; text-align: center;">
                        <b>
                         <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 18.0pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light',sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: LT;">
                          3. APPEAL PROCEDURE
                         </span>
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Appeals will only be considered if the applicant believes there has been a failure in the admissions procedure or that they have been discriminated against unlawfully. All appeals should be made in writing within 10 days after the decision has been communicated. All appeals should be directed to the ESWOCHY Consortium Coordinator unless the appeal is regarding the Coordinator, in which case the written appeal should be directed to the Governing Board.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">
                        <span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: 'Bahnschrift Light', sans-serif;">
                         Any appeal will be accorded thorough consideration and will normally be addressed within 28 calendar days of receipt. Where an appeal does not produce the outcome sought by the applicant, reasons should be given for any decision.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>

      <main class="site-main" id="main" role="main">
       <div class="content-wrap">
        <article class="entry content-bg single-entry post-1034 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-1034">
         <div class="entry-content-wrap">
          <div class="entry-content single-content">
           <div class="elementor elementor-1034" data-elementor-id="1034" data-elementor-settings="[]" data-elementor-type="wp-page">
            <div class="elementor-inner">
             <div class="elementor-section-wrap">
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-7a3ecf30 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="7a3ecf30" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","shape_divider_top":"tilt","shape_divider_bottom":"tilt"}'>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-top" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-bottom" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-14682f41" data-element_type="column" data-id="14682f41">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-693c93ef elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="693c93ef" data-widget_type="heading.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <h1 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                       Fees & Scholarships
                      </h1>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-907781b elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="907781b">
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-f46b92d" data-element_type="column" data-id="f46b92d">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-8879b1d elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="8879b1d" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         TUITION FEES
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The tuition fee for EU citizens is 5800 euros for the two-year ESWOCHY programme.
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The tuition fee for non-EU citizens is 7800 euros for the two-year ESWOCHY programme.
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Tuition fees can be paid in two instalments corresponding to the two years of the programme.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         SCHOLARSHIPS
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         For the EMJMD scholarships, students are divided in two categories: Programme countries students and Partner countries students. See the
                         <a href="https://ec.europa.eu/programmes/erasmus-plus/programme-guide/part-a/who-can-participate/eligible-countries_en">
                          European website
                         </a>
                         for an explanation of these categories.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The EMJMD scholarships are including student participation costs (including the tuition fees, full insurance coverage and any other mandatory costs related to student participation in the course), a contribution to student travel and installation cost and a subsistence allowance for the entire duration of the EMJMD study programme.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Contribution to subsistence costs
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         1 000 EUR per month for the entire duration of the EMJMD study programme (24 months maximum).
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Contribution to subsistence costs will neither be given to the scholarship holders for the EMJMD periods (study/research/placement/thesis preparation) spent in their country of residence, nor to scholarship holders from a Partner Country for the EMJMD periods exceeding one trimester (i.e. 3 months or the equivalent of 15 ECTS credits) spent in any Partner Country.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Contribution to the travel and installation costs
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         1 000 EUR per year per scholarship holder resident in a Programme Country for travel costs
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         2 000 EUR per year for travel costs + 1.000 EUR for installation costs for a scholarship holder, resident in a Partner Country less than 4000 KM from the EMJMD coordinating HEI.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         3000 EUR per year for travel costs + 1.000 EUR for installation costs for a scholarship holder, resident in a Partner Country further than 4000 KM or more from the EMJMD coordinating HEI.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Contribution to participation costs
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Upon formal agreement with the student at the time of signature of the Student Agreement, the Coordinating Institution will deduct the Participation Costs directly from the contribution to participation costs at the beginning of each academic year. This scholarship component will not be therefore paid to the student.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Erasmus+ EMJMD Scholarship rules
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Scholarships are awarded only for participation in the complete EMJMD programme (24 months).
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Students who have already obtained an EMJMD scholarship or an Erasmus Mundus Master Course/Joint Doctorate scholarship are NOT eligible to receive another scholarship under EMJMD.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         EMJMD scholarship holders cannot at the same time be beneficiaries of a grant for student or staff mobility in the framework of other higher education programmes funded by the EU budget.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         There are maximum 3 grants for students of the same nationality.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Contribution to subsistence costs will not be given to the scholarship holders for the EMJMD periods (study/research/placement/thesis preparation) spent in their country of residence.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Contribution to subsistence costs will not be given to scholarships holders from a Partner Country for the EMJMD periods exceeding one trimester (i.e., three months or the equivalent of 15 ECTS credits) spent in any Partner Country.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Applicants with more than one nationality have to chose one nationality and apply with that one.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The 12 months residence rule should be observed.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <i>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          The top students on the reserve list will be offered a self-paying position in the programme.
                         </span>
                        </i>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>
             </div>

        </article>
