                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <h4 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                       1st semester
                      </h4>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-22dd13b1 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="22dd13b1" data-widget_type="heading.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <h4 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                       Mykolas Romeris University (LT)
                      </h4>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-66 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-e95d5cf" data-element_type="column" data-id="e95d5cf">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2f69e98e elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="2f69e98e" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <a href="https://www.mruni.eu/en">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          https://www.mruni.eu/en
                         </span>
                        </a>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <strong>
                         Local Academic Coordinator:
                         <br/>
                        </strong>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Raminta Bardauskienė
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <strong>
                          Email address:
                          <br/>
                         </strong>
                         <a href="mailto:raminta@mruni.eu">
                          raminta@mruni.eu
                         </a>
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <strong>
                         Mykolas Romeris University
                         <br/>
                        </strong>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Ateities st. 20,
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         LT-08303 Vilnius
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Lithuania
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="text-align: left;">
                         All the important information you can find in the
                         <a href="https://mruni-my.sharepoint.com/:b:/g/personal/i_meironaite_mruni_eu/EUnp9lXrQj1Au_py9uTMRvMBgbYS3YXUDh1JJLjwCH66vQ?e=T8sqLh">
                          Basic guide to Vilnius.
                         </a>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The first semester starts with one-day an icebreaking/teambuilding. Informational seminars “Procedure of Studies at MRU” and “Academic ethics and Academic writing at Mykolas Romeris University” will be organized. After the introductory day, is start to implementing ESWOCHY courses of the 1
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         st
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         semester: Social Work Theories, Professional Development and Supervision in Social Work (including field visits), Social Research Methodology, Comparative European Social Policy for Children and Youth, Master Thesis. Field visits are complemented by the course Professional Development and Supervision in Social Work.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-1b8ffb2 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="1b8ffb2" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","shape_divider_top":"tilt","shape_divider_bottom":"tilt"}'>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-top" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-bottom" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-62449fc" data-element_type="column" data-id="62449fc">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-4f2a95a elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="4f2a95a" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Mykolas Romeris University (MRU) is named after the father of Lithuania‘s Constitutional Law Professor Mykolas Romeris (1880-1945).
                         <br/>
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         MRU – the largest social sciences specialized university in Lithuania, whose most prominent studies and research components are law, public security and public administration.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The University has capable and significant core educational science, economics, humanities, communication, politics, psychology, sociology, and management areas.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         These Faculties operate at the University:
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Law School;
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Public Security Academy (Kaunas);
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Faculty of Human and Social Studies;
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Faculty of Public Governance and Business.
                         <br/>
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         There are about 7,500 students and auditors studying at the University.
                         <br/>
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         MRU implements meaningful international and national studies and research projects (on average about 50 projects per year).
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The European Commission funded international study, “Creating a Culture of Social Innovation in Higher Education” found that MRU is the best university to develop social innovation among several hundred universities in Central and Eastern Europe.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         MRU was the first in Lithuania to begin to implement joint studies programmes with France‘s, Austria‘s and Finland‘s universities and developed strong research partnership ties with South Korean and other universities in the Asian region.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         South Korea, Japan, China and India were and continue to remain the main University cooperation development countries in the Asian region. Dongseo (South Korea), Josai (Japan), Huazhong University of Science and Technology (China) are only some of the many active university partners in the Asian region.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         There are 21 MRU studies programmes implemented in English (10-in the first cycle of studies, 17 – in second cycle. Of this, 9 are joint, 6 – validated or double diplomas as well as 6 national, taught in English).
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>

                    <section class="elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-11b71d3 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="11b71d3">

                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-37bcca66 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="37bcca66" data-widget_type="heading.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <h4 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                       2nd semester
                      </h4>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-8367c39 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="8367c39" data-widget_type="heading.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <h4 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                       Riga Stradins
University (LV)
                      </h4>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-66 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-79e77d05" data-element_type="column" data-id="79e77d05">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7e1bb563 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="7e1bb563" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <a href="http://www.rsu.lv/en/">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          http://www.rsu.lv/en/
                         </span>
                        </a>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <strong>
                         Local Academic Coordinator of the Programme
                        </strong>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <strong>
                          Anna Broka:
                         </strong>
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <a href="mailto:anna.broka@rsu.lv">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          anna.broka@rsu.lv
                         </span>
                        </a>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <strong>
                         Rīgas Stradiņa Universitāte
                         <br/>
                         Anniņmuižas bulvāris 26a
                         <br/>
                         <span style="color: var(--global-palette6); font-family: var(--global-body-font-family);">
                          Rīga LV 1067
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         LATVIA
                        </strong>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The second semester of the study programme ESWOCHY takes place in Riga, Latvia, at the Riga Stradiņš University. The study is organized at the Department of Social Welfare and Social Work, Faculty of Public Health and Social Welfare.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-3e4ef639 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="3e4ef639" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","shape_divider_top":"tilt","shape_divider_bottom":"tilt"}'>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-top" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-bottom" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-4a64e125" data-element_type="column" data-id="4a64e125">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-67caa8c elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="67caa8c" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Riga Stradiņš University (RSU) is a public university established in 1950. RSU performs its activities especially in the areas of the medicine, public health, and social sciences, as well as in the areas of law, economics and management.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The university education at the Faculty of Public Health and Social Welfare is based on the EuropeanCredit Transfer System, which guarantees compatibilitywith leading educational institutions and thusallows student mobility between universities throughoutthe European Union. The Faculty of Public Health and Social Welfare at the Riga Stradiņš University, offers two levelsof studies – B.A. and M.A. Doctoral School offers Doctoral studies.At each level of education, students havean opportunityto choose subjects from the study program,according to their interests, from their own departmentand from other departments.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Riga Stradiņš University provides a university education and organizes research leading to the integral for thegood of the society and personal growth of students.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-1f0a24cd" data-element_type="column" data-id="1f0a24cd">

                    <section class="elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-2975856 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="2975856">

                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <h4 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                       Catholic University in Ruzomberok (SK)
                      </h4>
                     </div>
                    </div>

                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-66 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-405d8b79" data-element_type="column" data-id="405d8b79">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6399a847 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="6399a847" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <a href="http://www.ku.sk/en/">
                          http://www.ku.sk/en/
                         </a>
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://eu.pf.ku.sk/en/">
                         <span style="color: var(--global-palette6); font-family: var(--global-body-font-family);">
                          http://eu.pf.ku.sk/en/
                         </span>
                        </a>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <strong>
                          Local Academic Coordinator:
                         </strong>
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Daniel Markovič
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <strong>
                          Email address:
                         </strong>
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <a href="mailto:daniel.markovic@ku.sk">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          daniel.markovic@ku.sk
                         </span>
                        </a>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <strong>
                         Katolícka univerzita v Ružomberku
                         <br/>
                         Hrabovská cesta 1A
                         <br/>
                         034 01  Ružomberok
                         <br/>
                         Slovakia
                        </strong>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The third semester of the study programme ESWOCHY takes place in Ružomberok, Slovakia, at the Catholic University. The study is organized at the Faculty of Education, Department of Social Work.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-2047bfd4 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="2047bfd4" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","shape_divider_top":"tilt","shape_divider_bottom":"tilt"}'>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-top" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-bottom" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-cb57875" data-element_type="column" data-id="cb57875">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1b513dd0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="1b513dd0" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Catholic University in Ružomberok (CU) is a public university established in 2000. CU performs its activities especially in the areas of the humanities, historical, pedagogical, and social and health sciences, as well as in the areas of art, economics and management. Catholic University has been the member of International Federation of Catholic Universities since 2004. University has also been the member of Fédération des Universités Catholiques Européennes (FUCE) since 2007.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The university education at the Faculty of Education CUis based on the EuropeanCredit Transfer System, which guarantees compatibilitywith leading educational institutions and thusallows student mobility between universities through out the European Union. The Faculty of Education, at the Catholic University, offers all three levels of studies – Bc., Mgr. and PhD.At each level of education, students havean opportunityto choose subjects from the study program,according to their interests, from their own departmentand from other departments.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Shaping Hearts and Minds: In the spirit of a Catholic, moral, intellectual and academic tradition, we providea university education and carry out research leading to the integral personal growth and for thegood of the whole society.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>

                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <a href="https://www.iscte-iul.pt/">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">

                        </a>

                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <strong>

                         Jorge Ferreira
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <strong>
                          Email address:
                         </strong>
                         <br/>

                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <strong>
                          Local Administrative Manager:
                         </strong>
                         <br/>

                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Email address:
                         <br/>
                         <a href="mailto:joana.afonso@iscte-iul.pt">
                          joana.afonso@iscte-iul.pt
                         </a>
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         ISCTE – Instituto Universitário de Lisboa
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Avenida das Forças Armadas, 1649-026 Lisboa
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        All the important information you can find in the
                        <strong>
                         <a href="https://mruni-my.sharepoint.com/:b:/g/personal/raminta_mruni_eu/EVoqmTvoLiRJhP9tlX94CFsBPUb_8ZXKiB_wMNnQKs9urQ?e=8QvhBr">
                          Basic guide to Lisbon.

                        </strong>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Portugal
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The fourth semester of the study programme ESWOCHY takes place in ISCTE-IUL and starts with one-day introductory activities. Followed by 1 week of intensive workshop as a preparation for the Master Thesis Project. Such workshops shall include: Master thesis peer review, data presentation, academic discussion with Master Thesis supervisors, research methodology with teachers and other students. The Student Master defence will be organized online at a given time in all universities.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-fb6f983 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="fb6f983" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","shape_divider_top":"tilt","shape_divider_bottom":"tilt"}'>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-top" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-bottom" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-5b84bc03" data-element_type="column" data-id="5b84bc03">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7a390060 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="7a390060" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The ISCTE – University Institute of Lisbon was founded in 1972 as one of Portugal’s first modern universities, with the central aim of studying labor and social dynamics in a rapidly changing world. Since its establishment, the university has expanded its disciplinary reach into four schools: ISCTE Business School, the School of Sociology and Public Policy, the School of Technology and Architecture and the School of Social Sciences and Humanities.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         In the panorama of public higher education in Portugal, ISCTE is the only specialized university institute, offering today 17 undergraduate courses, welcoming about 4,500 students, and more than 50 postgraduate, master’s and doctoral programmers. The education at ISCTE-IUL is based on the European Credit Accumulation and Transfer System (ECTS) credits and grading scale to facilitate the transfer of credits and marks after the examination sessions.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         The mission of ISCTE is to create and convey scientific knowledge according to the best international standards, training highly skilled professionals, mainly at the postgraduate level, in the areas of management, information technology and architecture, social sciences and public policy, for the advancement of society.
                        </span>
                       </p>

       <div class="content-wrap">
        <article class="entry content-bg single-entry post-1255 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-1255">
         <div class="entry-content-wrap">
          <div class="entry-content single-content">
           <div class="elementor elementor-1255" data-elementor-id="1255" data-elementor-settings="[]" data-elementor-type="wp-page">
            <div class="elementor-inner">
             <div class="elementor-section-wrap">
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-6c06d6b9 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="6c06d6b9" data-settings='{"background_background":"classic","shape_divider_top":"tilt","shape_divider_bottom":"tilt"}'>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-top" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-shape elementor-shape-bottom" data-negative="false">
                <svg preserveaspectratio="none" viewbox="0 0 1000 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                 <path class="elementor-shape-fill" d="M0,6V0h1000v100L0,6z">
                 </path>
                </svg>
               </div>
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-10605ee5" data-element_type="column" data-id="10605ee5">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3fcdf8a8 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="widget" data-id="3fcdf8a8" data-widget_type="heading.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <h1 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">
                       Administrative procedures
                      </h1>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </section>
              <section class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-c139e09 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-element_type="section" data-id="c139e09">
               <div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
                <div class="elementor-row">
                 <div class="elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-a2401c7" data-element_type="column" data-id="a2401c7">
                  <div class="elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated">
                   <div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
                    <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-550e0a6 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="widget" data-id="550e0a6" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Visa Permits
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Most of Erasmus Mundus students coming from non-European countries need to have a visa to start their studies in Europe. The EMJMD ESWOCHY Universities will assist students by rapidly providing the required University documents for visa application.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Migration regulations are a subject to change, therefore it is always useful to check at the Lithuanian embassy or consulate about what type of visa is needed. Updated information about the required documents and procedures is also available on Internet site of the
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://www.urm.lt/default/en/">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Ministry of Foreign Affairs
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         or
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://www.migracija.lt/index.php?-1497548128">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Lithuanian Migration department
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         . Depending on the citizenship and length of stay in Lithuania, one may be able to enter Lithuania without a visa (please check it at the closest Lithuanian Embassy before arrival or on internet site of the
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://keliauk.urm.lt/en/entry-to-lithuania/visas/list-of-countries-whose-citizens-do-not-require-visas-to-enter-the-republic-of-lithuania">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Ministry of Foreign Affairs
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         ).
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <b>
                         Students from EU or EFTA
                        </b>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         do not need a visa to enter the Republic of Lithuania. They can come and stay in Lithuania for 3 months. After that, they have to apply for the Certificate (of the form established by the Minister of the Interior) signifying their right to temporarily reside in Lithuania at the local migration office.
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <b>
                         Documents to be submitted for a Certificate:
                        </b>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         1. Valid travel document;
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         2. Completed
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://www.migracija.lt/index.php?-183073642">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          form of application
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         ;
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         3. Document confirming that you are accepted at MRU (from your faculty/institute);
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         4. Bank statement confirming that you have enough funds during your stay in LT;
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         5. Health insurance;
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         6. Payment of 8,60 EUROS.
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <b>
                         Non-EU degree seeking students
                        </b>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         need a National multiple entry D type visa in order to arrive to Lithuania. They have to apply for it at the closest
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://www.urm.lt/default/lt/">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Embassy of Lithuania
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         before arrival (
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://keliauk.urm.lt/en/entry-to-lithuania/visas/list-of-countries-whose-citizens-do-not-require-visas-to-enter-the-republic-of-lithuania">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          http://keliauk.urm.lt/en/entry-to-lithuania/visas/list-of-countries-whose-citizens-do-not-require-visas-to-enter-the-republic-of-lithuania
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         ). D type visa can be valid for 12 months the longest. Therefore, 4-5 months before the expiration of visa D students have to apply for a Temporary Residence Permit (TRP) (valid for 1 or 2 years depending on student’s subsistence). 2-3 months before the expiration of TRP students have to apply for a TRP renewal.
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <b>
                         Documents to be submitted for a D type visa:
                        </b>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         1.
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://visa.vrm.lt/epm/">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Application form
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ol start="2">
                        <li>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Valid travel document (issued in the last ten years with a validity of at least 3 months longer than the period of validity of the visa applied for);
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          3. Mediation letter number from the University;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          4. Health Insurance (valid in all Schengen countries till the expiration date of requested visa) for at least 30000 Eur;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          5. Bank statement confirming that you have sufficient amount of money to live in Lithuania (304 Eur per month = 3648 Eur per year + 555 Eur for travel expenses);
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          6. One colour photo (35×45 mm);
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          7. Paid fee of 120 Eur.
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ol>
                       <p>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Documents to be submitted for TRP issuing:
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         You must first submit an application for an issue of a temporary residence permit electronically through the Lithuanian Migration Information System (MIGRIS –
                        </span>
                        <a href="https://www.migracija.lt/">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          https://www.migracija.lt/
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         )
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         You can see how to fill in the application form in this
                        </span>
                        <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FKYEMh5MKho&fbclid=IwAR281o6SSSzoxPmzf79IbfGhOSkN2SoDUGbVKxi_502EfE7qfuoh7PYWHyg">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          video
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         .
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         After submitting the application and booking an appointment through MIGRIS, you must submit the biometric data and the following documents in person within 4 months from the date of submission of the application to MIGRIS:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ol>
                        <li>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Application number (after submitting the application form using Lithuanian migration information system (MIGRIS));
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          2. Valid travel document (passport);
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          3. Mediation letter number from the University;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          4. Consent of the parents or a parent, the guardian (carer) or other legal representative to the anticipated stay (studies) in the Republic of Lithuania, if the foreigner is a minor;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          5. Bank statement confirming that you have sufficient amount of money to live in Lithuania (304 Eur per month = 3648 Eur per year)**;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          6. Letter proving place of residence;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          7. Police clearance certificate in your country (or in a country in which you have lived for longer than 6 months during the last 2 years) certifying the fact that you have (not) been convicted of a crime (translated into Lithuanian and properly legalised; certificate must be issued not earlier than 6 months before the application for a TRP)***;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          8. Health Insurance (valid in all Schengen countries till the expiration date of requested TRP) (sum insured – EUR 6,000)**;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          9. Document certifying legal stay in Lithuania;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          10. Paid state fee:
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          – on a general basis (3 months) – EUR 120
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          – on an urgent basis (45 calendar days) – EUR 240
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <b>
                          After receiving information that the decision to issue a TRP is taken, the student must:
                         </b>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          • Apply for formalization of TRP in Migration Office in order to get Temporary residence card****;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          • Declare the living place at the local Office of the Municipality (Verkių Seniūnija; Kalvarijų str. 156, Vilnius, room No. 3) if it is not done already at the Migration Office;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          • Timely apply for renewal of TRP (not later than 2 months before expiry of the current one).
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ol>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         Documents to be submitted for TRP renewal:
                        </b>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         You must first submit an application for renewal of a temporary residence permit electronically through the Lithuanian Migration Information System (MIGRIS –
                        </span>
                        <a href="https://www.migracija.lt/">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          https://www.migracija.lt/
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         )
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         You can see how to fill in the application form in this
                        </span>
                        <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FKYEMh5MKho&fbclid=IwAR281o6SSSzoxPmzf79IbfGhOSkN2SoDUGbVKxi_502EfE7qfuoh7PYWHyg">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          video
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         .
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         After submitting the application and booking an appointment through MIGRIS, you must submit the biometric data and the following documents in person within 4 months from the date of submission of the application to MIGRIS:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ol>
                        <li>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Application number (after submitting the application form using Lithuanian migration information system (MIGRIS));
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          2. Valid travel document (passport);
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          3. Mediation letter number from the University;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          4. Consent of the parents or a parent, the guardian (carer) or other legal representative to the anticipated stay (studies) in the Republic of Lithuania, if the foreigner is a minor;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          5. Bank statement confirming that you have sufficient amount of money to live in Lithuania (304 Eur per month = 3648 Eur per year)**;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          6. Letter proving place of residence;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          7. Health Insurance (valid in all Schengen countries till the expiration date of requested TRP) (sum insured – EUR 6,000)**;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          8. Document certifying legal stay in Lithuania;
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          9. Paid state fee:
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          – on a general basis (2 months) – EUR 120
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          – on an urgent basis (1 month) – EUR 240
                         </span>
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          <br/>
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                        </li>
                       </ol>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         NOTE!
                        </b>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Only full package of documents is accepted for consideration of visa D or TRP! Double-check if all your documents are prepared for submission –
                        </span>
                        <a href="http://www.migracija.lt/esu-studentas1">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          Check-list
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         .
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         NOTE!
                        </b>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         Letter proving place of residence from MRU “Student house” will be provided for students who have got agreement with it.
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                        <b>
                         NOTE!
                        </b>
                        <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                         From 9 March 2020, an alien who applies for a temporary residence permit or its replacement may submit a document on his / her proper residential premises (when this document is required) at his / her choice:
                        </span>
                       </p>
                       <ul>
                        <li aria-level="1" style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          when filling in the application in the Lithuanian Migration Information System (hereinafter referred to as “the LMIS”);
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li aria-level="1" style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          upon arrival to the Migration Department at the scheduled time of the visit to provide documents and biometric data;
                         </span>
                        </li>
                        <li aria-level="1" style="font-weight: 400;">
                         <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                          when withdrawing the temporary residence permit.
                         </span>
                         <a href="http://www.migracija.lt/-/an-alien-may-also-present-a-document-on-his-/-her-residential-premises-when-withdrawing-the-temporary-residence-permit?redirect=%2F">
                          <span style="font-weight: 400;">
                           More information
                          </span>
                         </a>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <p>
                        <br/>
                        <br/>
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>

                     <div class="elementor-widget-container">
                      <div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
                       <p>
                        A mandatory health insurance scheme will be provided by the consortium to all enrolled EMJMD students, in accordance with the EMJMD guidelines “Minimum requirements for the Health and Accident Insurance coverage of Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees students” (
                        <a href="https://wayback.archive-it.org/12090/20210126054520/https:/eacea.ec.europa.eu/sites/eacea-site/files/750MB/2020_emjmd_-_annex_ix_health_accident_insurance_-_final.pdf">
                         read here
                        </a>
                        ):
                       </p>
                       <ol>
                        <li>
                         Coverage: travel and all-risks (as listed in the EMJMD Minimum Requirements for Health and Accident Insurance Cover);
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         Conditions: non-deductible. Non-permanent and non-chronic mental disorders will not be accepted as exclusions;
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         Restrictions: TBD;
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         Helpdesk: available 24 hours a day in English.
                        </li>
                       </ol>
                       <p>

}
.file-upload-container{
	padding:10px 0px;
	border-bottom:1px solid #ddd;
	margin-bottom:10px;
}

                          <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                           <i class="fas fa-minus">
                           </i>
                          </span>
                         </span>
                         <a class="elementor-accordion-title" href="">
                          Can I apply for a second Erasmus Mundus scholarship?
                         </a>
                        </div>
                        <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-3571" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="1" id="elementor-tab-content-3571" role="tabpanel">
                         <p>
                          No, individuals who have already benefited from an EMJMD scholarship are not eligible for a
                          <br/>
                          second scholarship in order to follow the same or another EMJMD.
                         </p>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div class="elementor-accordion-item">
                        <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-3572" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="2" id="elementor-tab-title-3572" role="tab">
                         <span aria-hidden="true" class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-left">
                          <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed">
                           <i class="fas fa-plus">
                           </i>
                          </span>
                          <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                           <i class="fas fa-minus">
                           </i>
                          </span>
                         </span>
                         <a class="elementor-accordion-title" href="">
                          Can I defer my offer?
                         </a>
                        </div>
                        <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-3572" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="2" id="elementor-tab-content-3572" role="tabpanel">
                         <p>
                          Deferrals are not possible as it is a highly competitive programme with limited places.
                         </p>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div class="elementor-accordion-item">
                        <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-3573" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="3" id="elementor-tab-title-3573" role="tab">
                         <span aria-hidden="true" class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-left">
                          <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed">
                           <i class="fas fa-plus">
                           </i>
                          </span>
                          <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                           <i class="fas fa-minus">
                           </i>
                          </span>
                         </span>
                         <a class="elementor-accordion-title" href="">
                          How long does the study of ESWOCHY take?
                         </a>
                        </div>
                        <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-3573" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="3" id="elementor-tab-content-3573" role="tabpanel">
                         <p>
                          ESWOCHY lasts for 2 years (4 semesters).
                         </p>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div class="elementor-accordion-item">
                        <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-3574" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="4" id="elementor-tab-title-3574" role="tab">
                         <span aria-hidden="true" class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-left">
                          <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed">
                           <i class="fas fa-plus">
                           </i>
                          </span>
                          <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                           <i class="fas fa-minus">
                           </i>
                          </span>
                         </span>
                         <a class="elementor-accordion-title" href="">
                          When is the start of the programme?
                         </a>
                        </div>
                        <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-3574" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="4" id="elementor-tab-content-3574" role="tabpanel">
                         <p>
                          The get-to-know day for the ESWOCHY programme starts in Vilnius, Lithuania and is normally held
                          <br/>
                          in the first week in September.
                         </p>
                        </div>
